title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.8 - Standards pertaining to Medicaid reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.8 - Standards pertaining to Medicaid reimbursement

State Regulations

Reimbursement for children's health and behavioral health
services must be in accordance with the rates and fees established by the State

Agencies and approved by the Director of the Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
823.8

New

Adopted

New

York State Register January 24, 2018 /Volume XL, Issue 04, eff. 1/24/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
